rules_text:
[i]Scion of Life[/i] – Tiki, Scion of Life's power and toughness are equal to the number of lands you control.
[i]Nature's Balance [/i]– Whenever a land you control enters, create your choice of a Clue, Food or Treasure token.
[i]Convergence[/i] – As long as you control six or more lands, Shapeshifters you control have hexproof.
